hibernate-mapping.query: from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress = ? AND fileDownloadInfo.irFileId = ? AND fileDownloadInfo.downloadDate = ?

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.irFileId = ? and (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) = 0

select fileDownloadInfo from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) != 0 order by fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress, fileDownloadInfo.downloadDate desc

insert into IpIgnoreFileDownloadInfo(ipAddress, ipAddressPart1, ipAddressPart2, ipAddressPart3, ipAddressPart4, irFileId, downloadCount, downloadDate) select fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress, fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1, fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2, fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3, fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4, fileDownloadInfo.irFileId, fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount, fileDownloadInfo.downloadDate from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.id in(:ids)
delete from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.id in(:ids)

delete from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and ignore.storeCounts = false and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) != 0

select count(*) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) != 0

select new edu.ur.ir.statistics.IpDownloadCount (fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress, sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount)) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo group by fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress order by sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) asc

select new edu.ur.ir.statistics.IpDownloadCount (fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress, sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount)) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo group by fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress order by sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) desc
